alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL WAYNE... SOUTHEASTERN OAKLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN MACOMB COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenfield Village, or near Taylor, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Livonia, Troy, Southfield, Taylor, Romulus, Detroit, Dearborn, Royal Oak, Wyandotte, Birmingham, Detroit Zoo, Greenfield Village, Westland, Dearborn Heights, Roseville, Lincoln Park, Eastpointe, Southgate, and Madison Heights. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 36 and 65. I-94 between mile markers 197 and 218, and between mile markers 230 and 231. I-96 between mile markers 178 and 192. I-696 between mile markers 11 and 28. M-10 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
